title: What exactly is UserKernel?
body:
Watching active applications while I'm playing league, this is something always open.  It's also (Not Responding).  Quitting the process doesn't seem to  affect anything.  

There are also multiple "LoLPatcherUx"'s running.  

What do these processes relate to?

replies.body:
They're all part of League and these processes can house things like chat, the patcher, the client, and the game (when you launch into a match). 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
